RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH: O professor Alberto Barausse possui doutorado em Educao - Universit Cattolica del Sacro Cuore (1998). Tem experincia na rea de Educao, com nfase em Histria da Educao. Pesquisador na Universit degli Studi del Molise de 2001 at 2004. Professore Titular em Histria da Educao na Universit degli Studi del Molise desde 2012 onde lidera o Centro de Documentao e Pesquisa sobre a Histria das Instituies escolares, o livro didtico e a literatura infantil (CeSIS) e o Museu da Escola e da Educao Popular. Atualmente , tambem, professor e pesquisador Visitante da Pontifcia Universidade Catlica do Rio Grande do Sul, no Programa de Ps graduao em Educao tambm. Integra o Grupo de Pesquisa: Do Deutscher Hilfsverein ao Colgio Farroupilha/RS: Entre memrias e histrias (1858-2018), coordenado por Maria Helena Cmara Bastos; integra, tambm, o grupo de pesquisa coordenado por Terciane ngela Luchese da Universidade de Caxias do Sul Histria da Educao, Imigrao e Memoria (GRUPHEIM). Como colaborador estrangeiro integra, tambm, o grupo &quot;TRANSFOPRESS BRASIL . Transnational network for the study of foreign language press&quot; coordenado pelas Profa. Dra. Valria Guimares (UNESP) e Profa. Dra. Tania Regina de Luca (UNESP). Tem experincia na rea de Educao, com nfase em Histria da Educao, atuando principalmente nos seguintes temas: histria da escola e das instituies educacionais, cultura escolar e livros escolares, sculos XIX e XX, patrimnio histrico educacional, educao e imigrao. Ele integra diferentes comits cientficos de revistas e diretor de colees editorial
RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN: Alberto Barausse is Full Professor at the University of Molise (Italy). He earns doctorate PhD in Education at the Catolic University of Milan &quot;Sacro Cuore&quot; (1998). Has experience in the filed of Education, focusing on History of Education. He was Researcher at University of Molise from 2001 to 2004, Since to 2012 to nowday he is Full Professor of History of Education in the University of Molise where supervises the CeSIS (Centre of documentation and reaserch on History of Educational institutions, of Textbooks and Children's Literature) amd the School Museum and Popular Education. Actually he is Visting Professor and Researcher at the Pontificia Universidade Catolica do Rio Grande do Sul. for the Program of &quot;Pos graduao&quot; in Education. He integrates the research group on Do Deutscher Hilfsverein ao Colgio Farroupilha/RS: Entre memrias e histrias (1858-2018) supervised by Maria Helena Cmara Bastos; he integrates the research group on Histria da Educao, Imigrao e Memoria (GRUPHEIM), supervised by Terciane Angela Luchese of the University of Caxias do Sul, too. He has experience in the field of Education with focus on History of Education and his work is directed on below issues: history of educationals istitution, school culture, century XIX and XX, heritage historical - educational. He is member of several Scientific Committe of International Review and he is director of publishing series.
